data.name: Step1_Title
data.value: Continuous support for our applications is available.

data.name: Step1_Description
data.value: We offer ongoing maintenance, bug fixes, and feature updates to keep your software running smoothly.

data.name: Step2_Title
data.value: Choose from 4 different levels of support.

data.name: Step2_Description
data.value: Select the plan that fits your needs—from basic monitoring to full-time dedicated support.

data.name: Step3_Title
data.value: Request a solution review at any time.

data.name: Step3_Description
data.value: Have us reassess your application against the latest standards and best practices whenever you need.

data.name: Step4_Description
data.value: If changes are needed, we’ll deliver new designs along with a clear implementation plan.
